statements: SELECT * FROM Communication ORDER BY policy_update_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM Communication WHERE renewal_notice_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_type, customer_id FROM Communication WHERE communication_type LIKE 'Renewal%';
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE policy_update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM Communication ORDER BY renewal_notice_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '12345' AND communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT communication_id, policy_update_date FROM Communication WHERE renewal_notice_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE policy_update_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY renewal_notice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM Communication GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type FROM Communication WHERE communication_type LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Communication;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id FROM Communication;
SELECT policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT communication_id, policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE policy_update IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE communication_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY communication_id DESC;
SELECT renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE communication_id = 4;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id FROM Communication WHERE policy_update LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM Communication;
SELECT communication_id, message, communication_date FROM Communication ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, message FROM Communication WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, premium_amount FROM Policy ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, policy_start_date FROM Customer INNER JOIN Policy ON Customer.customer_id = Policy.customer_id;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, message FROM Communication WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Communication;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE communication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE policy_update IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM Communication GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_communications DESC;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT customer_id, policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Communication ORDER BY communication_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM Communication GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT communication_id, policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = 'abc123';
SELECT policy_update, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = 'def456' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date FROM Communication WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date FROM Communication WHERE communication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_update FROM Communication WHERE policy_update IS NOT NULL ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, renewal_notice FROM Communication WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
